name: Lucas
message: Hey community, Lucas here. Wanted to share a quick success story. Last season, I used futures for the first time to hedge about 30% of my crop. When the market unexpectedly turned, I managed to secure a much better price than the spot market. It was a learning curve, but well worth it. Happy to share more about my approach if anyone's interested !

name: Farmer 78
message:
Hi everyone, it's Mia from Montana.
This year's been tough with the drought affecting almost 40% of my yield. 
I hadn't locked in futures as I should have, and now I'm facing lower prices. 
Any advice on damage control?
